com.operators.swipes
Class SwipesManager

java.lang.Object
  android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
      com.operators.swipes.SwipesManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener, GestureDetector.OnGestureListener, View.OnTouchListener
public class SwipesManager
extends GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
implements View.OnTouchListener

The Swipes Manager is an abstraction of fling operations (in 4 directions). It will allow the swiping away of the currently viewed card (or View), to the top, bottom, left or right of the screen (but only if the method OnSwipeListener.isAllowed(Directions) returns true).

Author:
christopher
See Also:
com.operators.swipes.SwipesManager.OnSwipeListener#isAllowed(Directions)

Nested Class Summary
static interface SwipesManager.OnSwipeListener
          Swipes Listener that updates on swipe threshold and direction, and allows for other checks and callbacks.
